alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 8:23PM AKST until December 07 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heaviest toward Wasilla this evening and then increase toward the Palmer area overnight. Snowfall along the Parks/Glenn Highway will linger through Wednesday morning before ceasing in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
